text: Kristyn Wong-Tam (born c. 1972) is a Canadian politician. She is a city councillor in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. She is councillor for the Toronto Centre-Rosedale electoral district (Ward 27). She was elected to Toronto City Council in the 2010 city council election to replace Kyle Rae who had chosen to retire, defeating opponent Ken Chan in the heated race by just 400 plus votes. She was re-elected in 2014.

Nathanael Ming-Yan Wei, Baron Wei (chinesisch 韋鳴恩 / 韦鸣恩, Pinyin Wéi Míng'ēn), bekannt als Nat Wei, * 19. Januar 1977 in Watford, Hertfordshire ist ein britischer Social Entrepreneur, Berater der britischen Regierung im Rahmen des „Big Society“-Projekts, Politiker der Conservative Party und Mitglied des House of Lords. Wei ist Gründer und Partner der Shaftesbury Partnership, Mitglied des Gründungsteams von Teach First und früherer strategischer Berater bei der Wohltätigkeitsorganisation Absolute Return For Kids.

James Tien Pei-chun, GBS, OBE, JP (born 8 January 1947, Shanghai) is the former Chairman and Leader of the Liberal Party (LP) and former member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong (Legco). Coming from the background of an entrepreneur, he was also a non-official member of the Executive Council of Hong Kong (Exco), member of Central and Western and Kwai Tsing District Council and Hong Kong member to the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC).

words: 在南洋通稱黃福或黃亞福
因曾承包柔佛蘇丹王宮工程
是馬來西亞柔佛州著名的港主和企业家
他与苏丹阿布峇卡和皇后花蒂瑪
新山的许多历史建筑物都是他承建的
而獲蘇丹頒發柔佛王室效忠勛章
包括柔佛大皇宫和新山监狱
过后发展成橡胶种植园主及建筑商
并成为柔佛州政府的主要建筑承包商
text: 黃亞福，SMJ（Wong Ah Fook，1837年－1918年9月12日），是馬來西亞柔佛州著名的港主和企业家，原籍为广东台山县，字彥廷，號甫田。原名黃福基，在南洋通稱黃福或黃亞福。于1854年移居至新加坡，原為一名木匠，过后发展成橡胶种植园主及建筑商，并成为柔佛州政府的主要建筑承包商。他与苏丹阿布峇卡和皇后花蒂瑪（黃亞嬌）的关系很好，新山的许多历史建筑物都是他承建的，包括柔佛大皇宫和新山监狱。因曾承包柔佛蘇丹王宮工程，而獲蘇丹頒發柔佛王室效忠勛章。在新山創辦柔盛公司、柔盛餉碼和謙源公司。

words: 同年代表人民力量出選立法會
但選舉日翌日在Facebook指出從來不是人民力量的支持者
同時主張狙擊泛民主派
以及出版小說漫畫報紙和搞劇場棟篤笑
在2016年立法會選舉參選九龍東議席時
以文化抗共旗幟號召香港文化建國
nouns: 但選舉日翌日在Facebook指出從來不是人民力量的支持者
text: 黃洋達 （Wong Yeung-tat，1979年5月29日－），小說作家、電影及電視編劇、香港本土派社運人士。2012年成立政治組織熱血公民，以文化抗共旗幟號召香港文化建國，同時主張狙擊泛民主派。同年代表人民力量出選立法會，但選舉日翌日在Facebook指出從來不是人民力量的支持者。因主持《笑死朕》、《皇上有話兒》等網台節目，以及出版小說漫畫報紙和搞劇場棟篤笑，被網民及支持者稱為「皇上」，「大亨」，在2016年立法會選舉參選九龍東議席時，其職業申報為「傳媒大亨」。

words: 2015年因多次公開呼籲有條件地支持政改方案
現任香港房屋委員會委員及
前民主黨成員及前新思維成員
text: 黃成智（Nelson Wong Sing-chi，1957年10月11日－），香港出生，註冊社工，前香港立法會議員、前民主黨成員及前新思維成員，現任香港房屋委員會委員及。2015年因多次公開呼籲有條件地支持政改方案，遭民主黨開除黨籍。

words: 2016年不再競逐連任立法會議員
其家族於1973年在香港創辦Toppy國際集團
方剛是香港紡織業聯會名譽會長方鏗之弟
他向港府倡議大量輸入外地勞工
希望反映香港商界及市民反對銷售稅的民意
飲食等行業組成反銷售稅大聯盟
代表自由黨在2004年立法會批發及零售界功能界別選舉中參選
香港政府為建議開徵商品及服務稅展開諮詢
主要銷售女裝成衣服裝
nouns: 其家族於1973年在香港創辦Toppy國際集團
text: 方剛，GBS，SBS，JP （英文：Vincent Fang Kang，1943年5月7日－）祖籍安徽，生於上海，香港製衣商人，現任自由黨黨魁。 方剛是香港紡織業聯會名譽會長方鏗之弟，其家族於1973年在香港創辦Toppy國際集團，主要銷售女裝成衣服裝，旗下品牌有Toppy、Episode、Colour 18等。 2004年，方剛正式參與政治，代表自由黨在2004年立法會批發及零售界功能界別選舉中參選，並當選成為議員。2006年7月，香港政府為建議開徵商品及服務稅展開諮詢。方剛聯同20多個零售、飲食等行業組成反銷售稅大聯盟，並出任主席，希望反映香港商界及市民反對銷售稅的民意。2013年1月，他向港府倡議大量輸入外地勞工 。2016年不再競逐連任立法會議員。

Lydia Selina Dunn, Baroness Dunn, DBE, JP (Chinese: 鄧蓮如; Jyutping: dang6 lin4 jyu4; pinyin: Dèng Liánrú; born 29 February 1940) is a Hong Kong Chinese business executive and former politician, who, under the British administration, had considerable influence in the Government of Hong Kong, including as the Senior Unofficial Member of (successively) both the Legislative Council and Executive Council. She is a longstanding director of banking giant HSBC and was its Deputy Chairman for 16 years.

(This is a Chinese name; the family name is Leung.) Leung Kwok-hung (born 27 March 1956 in Hong Kong), also known as Long Hair (Chinese: 長毛; Jyutping: coeng4 mou4*1), is a Hong Kong Left-wing political activist, a member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong (representing the New Territories East constituency), a founding member of the League of Social Democrats and a democratic political activist.

(This is a Chinese name; the family name is Lee.) Lee Wing-tat (born 25 December 1955 in Hong Kong) is a Member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong (LegCo), returned by direct election as representative of the New Territories West constituency. He was the third Chairman of the Democratic Party (DP). He is seen as a conservative inside the party.
("Ray Lau" redirects here. For other people named Raymond Lau, see Raymond Lau.)(This is a Chinese name; the family name is Lau.)

Leung Yiu-chung (Chinese: 梁耀忠, born 19 May 1953 in Hong Kong with family roots in Zhongshan, Guangdong). He is a member of the pro-labour Neighbourhood and Worker's Service Centre, part of the pan-democracy camp, and a long-time member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong, having served since 1995, except briefly between 1997 and 1998. Between 1998 and 2016 he represented the New Territories West geographical constituency, and since 2016 the District Council (Second) functional constituency. Leung has also been a member of the Kwai Tsing District Council since 1985.

Lau Wong-fat, GBM, JP (Chinese: 劉皇發, born 15 October 1936 in Tuen Mun, Hong Kong) is a former member of the Hong Kong Legislative Council, representing the Heung Yee Kuk constituency. He was a member of Hong Kong Executive Council and chairman of the powerful Heung Yee Kuk, which represents the interests of the New Territories establishment. He was also the chairman of Tuen Mun District Council. This political strength in rural Hong Kong has been morphed into power centrally and with the Beijing government. He earned his prestige by fighting for the New Territories indigenous interests by insert an article in the Hong Kong Basic Law to ensure their privileges remained protected after Hong Kong's handover to Chinese sovereignty in 1997 when he was a member of the Hong Kong Basic Law Drafting Committee. For this, together with his extensive ownership of land and property, he is known as the "King of the New Territories" (新界王) or the "Land Emperor of the New Territories" (新界土皇帝). Billionaire Lau is politically identified as part of the pro-Beijing camp. He is a member of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and has a close relationship with the Chinese Communist Party.

Lu Ruihua, chino: 卢瑞华| chino tradicional: 盧瑞華| pinyin: Lú Ruìhuá| jyutping: Lou4 Seui6 Wa4, (* Chaozhou, 1938 - ) es un político chino de la Provincia de Cantón. Nacido en noviembre de 1938 en Chaozhou, Cantón. Fue el séptimo Gobernador de Cantón en la historia de la República Popular China. Se unió al Partido Comunista de China en junio de 1972.

words: 第十一届全国政协副主席
原哈尔滨军事工程学院导弹工程系毕业
曾连任中共第十二至第十七届中央委员会委员
text: 廖暉（1942年5月－），廣東惠陽人，生於香港；原哈尔滨军事工程学院导弹工程系毕业。1965年加入中国共产党，曾连任中共第十二至第十七届中央委员会委员。第十屆、第十一届全国政协副主席。

Cyd Ho Sau-lan (Chinese: 何秀蘭; Jyutping: ho4 sau3 laan4) is a former member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong (Legco) for the Hong Kong Island constituency. She is a founding member of the Labour Party, since December 2011, and currently holds the position of vice-chairwoman. Previously, she was a founding member of The Frontier, another pro-democracy political group. Since 2006, she has been a founding councillor of the World Future Council. She has garnered a reputation for promoting universal suffrage, rule of law, human rights, and equal opportunity, as well as advancement in the interests of women, homosexuals and other minority groups.

(This is a Chinese name; the family name is Chan.) Chan Kam-lam, GBS, JP (Chinese: 陳鑑林; born 22 January 1949) is a former member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong representing the Kowloon East constituency. He is also a core member of the Democratic Alliance for the Betterment and Progress of Hong Kong (DAB), the largest pro-Beijing party in Hong Kong.

words: 他從事資訊科技及電訊業
香港互聯網協會創會主席
同時曾在多份香港報章撰寫專欄
2014年7月1日獲特區政府委任為太平紳士
1999年時曾被選為香港十大傑出數碼青年
香港資訊科技商會榮譽主席
主要評述資訊科技的發展
text: 莫乃光，JP（英語：Charles Peter Mok，1964年10月25日－）現任立法會議員（資訊科技界），香港互聯網協會創會主席，香港資訊科技商會榮譽主席，公共專業聯盟副主席。1999年時曾被選為香港十大傑出數碼青年。2014年7月1日獲特區政府委任為太平紳士。他從事資訊科技及電訊業，同時曾在多份香港報章撰寫專欄，主要評述資訊科技的發展。

تشان يون هان وتلقب أيضاً بالأخت هان ولدت في 16 نوفمبر/تشرين الثّاني عام 1946 في شينزن بالصين. هي إحدى أعضاء الإتحاد النسائي النشيطينِ في هونغ كونغ. هي نائب رئيس اتحاد هونغ كونغ لإتحادات العمال، وعضو التحالف الديمقراطيِ للتحسينِ والتقدّم فرع هونغ كونغ. أنتخبت في المجلس التشريعي لهونغ كونغ الليجو (Legco) من عام 1995 إلى عام 2008 ما جعلها النقابية النسائية الأولى التي تعمل كعضو في المجلس التشريعي Legco.

words: 前香港民主民生協進會執行委員會司庫
目前身兼香港明愛青少年中心主任
張國柱是香港泛民主派成員
香港社會工作者總工會會長
text: 張國柱（英语：Peter Cheung Kwok-che，1951年11月8日－），人稱「社總阿柱」，已婚，育有兩子，為註冊社工。張國柱是香港泛民主派成員。目前身兼香港明愛青少年中心主任、香港社會工作者總工會會長、工黨紀律委員會主席，前香港民主民生協進會執行委員會司庫、香港立法會議員（社會福利界） 。

words: 贊成各行各業全面設立最低工資
政治立場偏向自由主義
現時為執業大律師及D100節目主持
陳淑莊是公民黨創黨黨員
立法保障市民獲取資訊自由
最高工時以及推動累進稅制以確保社會資源公平分配
nouns: 現時為執業大律師及D100節目主持
text: 陳淑莊（Tanya Chan，1971年9月14日－），祖籍上海，香港執業大律師，香港立法會議員，前中西區區議會（山頂選區）民選議員。 陳淑莊是公民黨創黨黨員、外務副主席及前藝人。現時為執業大律師及D100節目主持。政治立場偏向自由主義，要求爭取普選、立法保障市民獲取資訊自由、推動政黨政治、贊成各行各業全面設立最低工資、最高工時以及推動累進稅制以確保社會資源公平分配，以法治、人權為核心價值。

Ronny Tong Ka-wah, SC (Chinese: 湯家驊; born 28 August 1950 in Hong Kong) is a Hong Kong Senior Counsel and politician. He co-founded the Civic Party and was a member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong, representing the New Territories East constituency from 2004 until he quit the party and resigned from the legislature on 22 June 2015, following the historic vote on Hong Kong electoral reform a few days earlier. He is currently the convenor of the centrist political group and think tank Path of Democracy.

(This is a Chinese name; the family name is Fan.) Rita Fan Hsu Lai-tai, GBM, GBS, CBE, JP (born 20 September 1945 in Shanghai, China) was the President of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong (LegCo) after the transfer of sovereignty from the United Kingdom in 1997. She was the first woman to hold that position. She is a member of the Hong Kong delegation to the 11th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.
User:RMCD bot/subject notice(For other people named Raymond Wong, see Raymond Wong (disambiguation).)

Ruan Yuan (阮元, 1764-1849), était un érudit de la dynastie Qing de la Chine impériale. Il obtint le jinshi (examen impérial) en 1789 et fut nommé ensuite à l'académie Hanlin. Il devint célèbre pour son travail sur les Biographies des Astronomes et des Mathématiciens.

words: 大學時期支援八九民運並參與
香港民間監管公共事業聯委會發言人
中學時期開始參與社運
真普選聯盟成員團體代表
text: 蔡耀昌（Choi Yiu Cheong Richard，1967年－），香港民間監管公共事業聯委會發言人、支聯會副主席、真普選聯盟成員團體代表、民主動力執委、民主黨中委，曾任沙田區區議員。祖籍廣東深圳，中學時期開始參與社運，大學時期支援八九民運並參與「六四」鎮壓後的營救工作。政界暱稱「阿狗」或「狗哥」。

Deng Fa (ur. 7 marca 1906 zm. 4 sierpnia 1946), chiński polityk komunistyczny. Pochodził z prowincji Guangdong. Uczestniczył w strajku marynarzy w Hongkongu (1925). Do KPCh wstąpił w 1930. Pełnił funkcję szefa Biura Bezpieczeństwa Państwowego Chińskiej Republiki Rad. W 1937 został mianowany szefem Biura Łącznikowego komunistycznej 8. Armii. W latach 1939 - 1942 był przewodniczącym Centralnej Szkoły Partyjnej. Zginął w sfingowanej katastrofie lotniczej.

Szeto Wah (Chinese: 司徒華; 28 February 1931 – 2 January 2011) was a politician of the pan-democracy camp of Hong Kong. He was formerly the chairman of The Hong Kong Alliance in Support of Patriotic Democratic Movements in China and a member of the Legislative Council from 1985 to 1997 and 1998 to 2004. Although the Hong Kong government prior to as well as after the British handover shunned him for his opposition to their policies, Szeto was admired in Hong Kong politics for his strong principles, for eschewing personal gain, and for his rare political acumen. According to commentator Stephen Vines, the Chinese central government appointed Szeto to the Hong Kong Basic Law Drafting Committee because they appreciated his political significance, even though they disliked his ideas. Aside from his political career, Szeto was also well known for his Chinese calligraphy skills. He was referred to as "Uncle Wah" (華叔) by Hong Kong people.

Ma Lik, GBS, JP (Chinese: 馬力; 23 February 1952 – 8 August 2007), was a Legislative Councillor, and was the Chairman of the Democratic Alliance for Betterment of Hong Kong (DAB), a pro-Beijing political party in Hong Kong.
Gary Fan Kwok-wai (born 30 October 1966) is a former member of Hong Kong Legislative Council and current member of the Sai Kung District Council in Hong Kong.

words: 中國國際經濟貿易仲裁委員會仲裁員
香港城市大學法律系副教授
她參加2012年香港立法會選舉出戰九龍西地區直選
中國人民大學法學碩士
香港大學法律專業證書
持有香港中文大學政治與行政學系學士學位
都會大學英國法律專業共同試課程文憑
曾任該校法律學院副院長
職業為香港執業大律師
她獲頒香港十大傑出青年
text: 梁美芬，SBS，JP（英语：Priscilla Leung Mei-fun，1961年11月18日－），祖籍廣東肇慶，職業為香港執業大律師，香港城市大學法律系副教授，曾任該校法律學院副院長，持有香港中文大學政治與行政學系學士學位，香港大學法律專業證書，英國曼徹斯特（理工）／都會大學英國法律專業共同試課程文憑，中國人民大學法學碩士、博士學位，中國國際經濟貿易仲裁委員會仲裁員。 她現為立法會議員，九龍城區議員，西九新動力召集人，專業會議成員。2000年，她獲頒香港十大傑出青年。2012年，她參加2012年香港立法會選舉出戰九龍西地區直選，成功連任。

Albert Ho Chun-yan (Chinese: 何俊仁; born 1 December 1951) is a solicitor and politician in Hong Kong. He is the current chairman of the Hong Kong Alliance in Support of Patriotic Democratic Movements in China and former chairman of the Democratic Party from 2006 to 2012. He is a solicitor and a former member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong for District Council (Second) constituency. In 2013, Ho grabbed international headlines after it was revealed that he had assisted Edward Snowden during the latter's stay in Hong Kong.
